Alpaca.name: Melpaca
Alpaca.desc:
Don't be fooled by this Pal's fluffy appearance.
A hypersonic kick from one of its long legs may
send you flying to the other side of the world.

AmaterasuWolf.name: Kitsun
AmaterasuWolf.desc:
Despite its appearance, <characterName id=|AmaterasuWolf|/> is extremely sensitive and will flee into a cave when spooked.
Long ago, it was considered an ill omen if one were found nearby.

Anubis.name: Anubis
Anubis.desc:
Once seen as a symbol of nobility, 
and an idol for those who shunned wealth and power.
Yet over time, this Pal became a token of death.

Baphomet.name: Incineram
Baphomet.desc:
In the dark of night, this Pal snatches prey to bring back to its territory.
What happens to those poor souls afterwards isn't too hard to imagine.

Baphomet_Dark.name: Incineram Noct
Baphomet_Dark.desc:
It specifically targets baby pals, taking them back to its territory.
One can only imagine the profound despair
of the parent Pal, whose child has been taken away.

Bastet.name: Mau
Bastet.desc:
Its hard tail does not deteriorate even when cut off.
Some believed these severed tails to be good luck,
but for the innumerable <characterName id=|Bastet|/> who were
poached as a result, they were anything but.

Bastet_Ice.name: Mau Cryst
Bastet_Ice.desc:
Its crystalline tail is beautiful, but shatters when this Pal dies.
Some believe it is good luck to raise one,
so <characterName id=|Bastet_Ice|/> in captivity are treated with great care.

BerryGoat.name: Caprity
BerryGoat.desc:
The shrub on this Pal's back produces berries as long as it is properly fed.
It offers these berries to potential mates, and if the flavor is to their liking, romance blossoms.

BirdDragon.name: Vanwyrm
BirdDragon.desc:
The melodies of a flute made from the exoskeleton of a <characterName id=|BirdDragon|/>
are said to cross whole mountain ranges.
In ages past, such flutes were used to signal an attack.

BirdDragon_Ice.name: Vanwyrm Cryst
BirdDragon_Ice.desc:
The melodies of a flute made from the exoskeleton of a <characterName id=|BirdDragon_Ice|/> are said to
cross whole mountain ranges.
In ages past, such flutes were used to signal victory in battle.

BlackCentaur.name: Necromus
BlackCentaur.desc:
Once one with <characterName id=|SaintCentaur|/>. 
Its darkened form is the embodiment of negative emotions. 
However, a glimmer of compassion can still be seen deep within its eyes.

BlackFurDragon.name: Dragostrophe
BlackFurDragon.desc:
A silent beast born of the abyss.
Thou shall not stand before the beast.
Thou shall not heed the beast.

BlackGriffon.name: Shadowbeak
BlackGriffon.desc:
Born from the depths of insanity, its very existence should not be.
Having lost all genetic ties to other Pals,
one wonders if it could still even be considered a Pal.

BlackMetalDragon.name: Astegon
BlackMetalDragon.desc:
A savage beast born of the abyss.
Thou shall not stand before the beast.
Thou shall not heed the beast.

BlueDragon.name: Azurobe
BlueDragon.desc:
This Pal's white ribbon turns black if doused with impure water.
Given its usefulness in detecting poison, this Pal was once overhunted.
This past has left them bitter towards humanity.

BluePlatypus.name: Fuack
BluePlatypus.desc:
Using its own body water, this Pal can create waves anywhere.
It body surfs when in a hurry, but the resulting speed often ends in a fatal collision.

Boar.name: Rushoar
Boar.desc:
Being an extremely aggressive Pal, it often picks fights before gauging its opponents' strength.
Though small, its powerful charge can even send boulders flying.

CaptainPenguin.name: Penking
CaptainPenguin.desc:
Surprisingly, it is unrelated to <characterName id=|Penguin|/>.
Ever wanting to be the center of attention, this Pal will strut its stuff for any onlookers.

Carbunclo.name: Lifmunk
Carbunclo.desc:
Intelligent as a five to seven-year-old human child.
It makes a wonderful partner, but there have been more than a few cases
where they've killed their master after learning to use weapons.

CatBat.name: Tombat
CatBat.desc:
Often appears out of the blue to flaunt its prized wings in front of other Pals.
Although this appears to be an intimidation tactic, 
the Pal seems to derive some kind of pleasure from the display.

CatMage.name: Katress
CatMage.desc:
With the power of shadows, it produces arcane phenomena.
It prefers to eat food raw and is particularly hostile towards <characterName id=|FoxMage|/>.

CatVampire.name: Felbat
CatVampire.desc:
Attacking from the shadows,
this Pal traps its prey within its cloak-like wings.
It's probably best not to know what happens within them,
or why the inside of its wings are stained red.

ChickenPal.name: Chikipi
ChickenPal.desc:
Extremely weak and far too delicious.
It is one of the weakest Pals alongside <characterName id=|SheepBall|/>.
No matter how many are hunted, they just keep appearing.

ColorfulBird.name: Tocotoco
ColorfulBird.desc:
A frightening Pal that produces exploding eggs.
It often fires these eggs from its rear end as a form of defense,
but when spent, the Pal itself explodes.

CowPal.name: Mozzarina
CowPal.desc:
Milk pours from this Pal like water from an open faucet, regardless of its gender.
It's truly a mystery of life, although this mystery may be better left unsolved.

CuteButterfly.name: Cinnamoth
CuteButterfly.desc:
Sniffing its scales produces a feeling of unparalleled euphoria.
There was some effort to further regulate this byproduct,
but the Free Pal Alliance have vehemently opposed these measures,
putting a stop to them.

CuteFox.name: Vixy
CuteFox.desc:
The idol of Palpagos Island.
If you bully a <characterName id=|CuteFox|/>,
you best be prepared to become enemies with the whole world.

CuteMole.name: Fuddler
CuteMole.desc:
Its large claws boast of diamond-like hardness.
However, sharpening these claws consumes most of its energy,
leading it to sometimes spending entire days doing nothing else.

DarkCrow.name: Cawgnito
DarkCrow.desc:
Long ago it freely soared the skies.
After losing a contest with <characterName id=|Eagle|/>, it abandoned the skies,
and now lives a secretive life in the dark of night.

DarkMutant.name: en_text
DarkMutant.desc:
Some say a beam from a <characterName id=|DarkMutant|/> that has
perfected its technique can tear holes into other dimensions.
It's even believed that certain species of Pals were born from such phenomena.

DarkScorpion.name: Menasting
DarkScorpion.desc:
Being made of pure energy, its insides are completely hollow.
This Pal crams still-living prey into its hollow body, where it absorbs them.
Hellish screams of pain can often be heard coming from inside this Pal.

Deer.name: Eikthyrdeer
Deer.desc:
The one who possesses the most impressive antlers becomes the leader of the herd.
If their antlers are broken, they become depressed
and leave the herd never to be seen again.

Deer_Ground.name: Eikthyrdeer Terra
Deer_Ground.desc:
The individual with the hardest horns becomes the leader.
Once the horns are lost, so too is its leadership status.
It leaves the herd amidst farewell glances and quietly returns to the earth.

DreamDemon.name: Daedream
DreamDemon.desc:
It puts those it is interested in to sleep and shows them
an endless stream of happy dreams.
Those who fall under its spell are never to wake until death takes them.

DrillGame.name: Digtoise
DrillGame.desc:
A walking contradiction, possessing the strongest shell and the only drill capable of piercing it.
|<characterName id=|DrillGame|/>'s Fable| is a popular children's tale.

Eagle.name: Galeclaw
Eagle.desc:
A Pal that can easily take flight even while grasping a human.
It is, however, prone to letting go when tired,
which has led to the sudden demise of more than a few souls.

ElecCat.name: Sparkit
ElecCat.desc:
During the dry season,
this Pal is always on the verge of blowing a fuse.
Sparks can fly with even the slightest provocation,
even amongst allies.

ElecLion.name: Boltmane
ElecLion.desc:
The more it moves, the more it heats up and the hair tips increasingly glow brighter.
At its peak, it becomes so dazzling that you risk blindness if you stare at it directly.

ElecPanda.name: Grizzbolt
ElecPanda.desc:
With a friendly smile and a hardy physique, it is docile
towards one it recognizes as a partner.
For reasons unexplained, its personality undergoes a drastic change when wielding a minigun.

FairyDragon.name: Elphidran
FairyDragon.desc:
It possesses a demeanor as pure as its appearance suggests.
Perhaps because of this, it is sometimes unable to discern good from evil,
often allowing wrongdoers to take advantage of it.

FairyDragon_Water.name: Elphidran Aqua
FairyDragon_Water.desc:
It possesses a demeanor as pure as its appearance suggests.
Perhaps because of this, it harbors no ill will in any of its actions
and is indifferent even after killing someone.

FengyunDeeper.name: Fenglope
FengyunDeeper.desc:
In ages past, its beautiful visage was
a common sight in paintings.
As time passed, its beautiful pelt and antlers were
often seen in works of art.

FireKirin.name: Pyrin
FireKirin.desc:
Its entire body has evolved into a highly efficient radiator,
gifting it with astounding stamina.
When someone has mounted it, this Pal takes caution not to burn them.

FireKirin_Dark.name: Pyrin Noct
FireKirin_Dark.desc:
It burns mysterious dark matter as energy
and expels the remaining particles from its body.
If someone rides it, they should take care so as not to gallop down the path of darkness.

FlameBambi.name: Rooby
FlameBambi.desc:
Wild <characterName id=|FlameBambi|/> surprisingly never get sick.
Eating one piece of charcoal a day, made by burning a branch,
is the secret to its eternal health.

FlameBuffalo.name: Arsox
FlameBuffalo.desc:
In ancient times, carnivorous Pals pursued them relentlessly.
The absurd fury in the cries of <characterName id=|FlameBuffalo|/> transformed into a raging inferno,
which has been passed on to this day.

FlowerDinosaur.name: Dinossom
FlowerDinosaur.desc:
A Pal who once angered cannot be pacified. It rages on and on like an inferno.
The phrase |step on a <characterName id=|FlowerDinosaur|/>'s tail| has come to mean enraging someone.

FlowerDinosaur_Electric.name: Dinossom Lux
FlowerDinosaur_Electric.desc:
Though struck by lightning, it lives on.
The phrase |struck by a <characterName id=|FlowerDinosaur_Electric|/>'s bolt| has come to mean
narrowly escaping death.

FlowerDoll.name: Petallia
FlowerDoll.desc:
A Pal that transforms into a massive plant when at the end of its life.
Once every ten years, a beautiful flower blooms
and a new <characterName id=|FlowerDoll|/> is born.

FlowerRabbit.name: Flopie
FlowerRabbit.desc:
It prefers places that have an abundance of vegetation,
but hay fever has apparently become a problem for
<characterName id=|FlowerRabbit|/> as of late.

FlyingManta.name: Celaray
FlyingManta.desc:
Riding the wind, this Pal travels where it pleases.
Should it find a partner along the way,
the encounter will mark its journey's end.

FoxMage.name: Wixen
FoxMage.desc:
With the power of light, it produces arcane phenomena.
It prefers to eat food well-done and is particularly hostile towards <characterName id=|CatMage|/>.

Ganesha.name: Teafant
Ganesha.desc:
Large amounts of water pour from what is thought to be its nose,
though some say that it is, in fact, just snot.
This has sparked a fierce debate among Pal scholars.

Garm.name: Direhowl
Garm.desc:
Long ago <characterName id=|Garm|/> would hunt alongside humans
but over the years this bond faded.

GhostBeast.name: Maraith
GhostBeast.desc:
It relishes the peculiar scent living things give off when they are near death.
If a <characterName id=|GhostBeast|/> has taken a liking to you,
it is safe to assume that is why.

Gorilla.name: Gorirat
Gorilla.desc:
It beats the ground rhythmically to communicate with its comrades.
The meaning of each rhythm differs by troop, but the distinction
between them is still largely unknown.

GrassMammoth.name: Mammorest
GrassMammoth.desc:
The vegetation on its back varies between individuals.
There is a long history of appreciating this veritable garden of a Pal,
and there are even <characterName id=|GrassMammoth|/> pruning specialists.

GrassMammoth_Ice.name: Mammorest Cryst
GrassMammoth_Ice.desc:
The vegetation on its back varies from individual to individual.
There was a time when seeds of presumed extinct plants were found
still frozen on the back of a <characterName id=|GrassMammoth_Ice|/>.

GrassPanda.name: Mossanda
GrassPanda.desc:
A Pal so powerful it's hard to believe.
In one experiment, this Pal tore through 3,000 sheets of paper at once!
It's only by some miracle that this Pal isn't a meat-eater.

GrassPanda_Electric.name: Mossanda Lux
GrassPanda_Electric.desc:
A Pal whose power is truly shocking.
By altering the electrical currents in its body, this Pal's been able to overload its own strength.
When it comes to sheer power, this Pal may be top of the list.

GrassRabbitMan.name: Verdash
GrassRabbitMan.desc:
Land that <characterName id=|GrassRabbitMan|/> has run across becomes extremely fertile,
with thick vegetation growing there soon after.
It will not run anywhere that herbicide has been used.

HadesBird.name: Helzephyr
HadesBird.desc:
It calls forth lightning from the depths of hell.
One who dies from <characterName id=|HadesBird|/>'s inferno
is sure to be sent to the underworld.

HawkBird.name: Nitewing
HawkBird.desc:
It carries newborn Pals to its nest and raises them
as a surrogate parent.
Once the baby Pal has fattened up, it hunts them.

Hedgehog.name: Jolthog
Hedgehog.desc:
Releases the electricity stored in its body when under attack,
producing a shock that can be over 10 million volts.
If thrown, it can even be more lethal than any conventional heavy weaponry.

Hedgehog_Ice.name: Jolthog Cryst
Hedgehog_Ice.desc:
It releases the cold air stored in its body when under attack.
The frigid blast it radiates is cold enough to freeze the surrounding air
and easily pierces through any attacker's body.

HerculesBeetle.name: Warsect
HerculesBeetle.desc:
The ultra-hard armor surrounding its body is
extremely strong and heat resistant.
Even a napalm blast would hardly leave a scratch.

Horus.name: Faleris
Horus.desc:
When it finds its prey it unleashes a whirlwind of flames, burning the entire area to ash.
<characterName id=|Horus|/> breath is known for its pleasing scent.

IceDeer.name: Reindrix
IceDeer.desc:
Its transparent cerulean antlers glow with the cold of absolute zero.
Any who touch them with their bare hands are instantly frozen over
and smashed to pieces.

IceFox.name: Foxcicle
IceFox.desc:
On nights when the aurora is visible,
it looks up towards the sky and begins to howl a beautiful song.
This does, however, leave it vulnerable to attacks from enemies.

IceHorse.name: Frostallion
IceHorse.desc:
Guardian deity of Palpagos Island, known as the Winter Caller.
In the past, when a calamity struck the land, it soared into the sky
and sealed away the threat by casting the island into an eternal winter.

IceHorse_Dark.name: Frostallion Noct
IceHorse_Dark.desc:
Guardian deity of Palpagos Island known as the Night Caller.
In the past, when a calamity struck the land, it soared into the sky
and sealed away the threat by casting the island into eternal darkness.

JetDragon.name: Jetragon
JetDragon.desc:
Watches over Palpagos Island from high above.
When calamity returns to the land, the earth will split open, and the skies will burn.
It is destined to strike down the calamity in a flash of total destruction.

Kelpie.name: Kelpsea
Kelpie.desc:
Its personality changes depending on the quality of the water it was born into.
<characterName id=|Kelpie|/> born into polluted waters are generally ill-tempered
and quickly become delinquents.

Kelpie_Fire.name: Kelpsea Ignis
Kelpie_Fire.desc:
Their personalities change depending on the temperature of the water where they were born.
<characterName id=|Kelpie|/> born in warm waters
generally have a passionate, motivated personality.

KingAlpaca.name: Kingpaca
KingAlpaca.desc:
<characterName id=|Alpaca|/> serve this Pal.
Contests between <characterName id=|KingAlpaca|/> offer up their vassals as a wager.
Those seen alone are losers of such contests.

KingAlpaca_Ice.name: Ice Kingpaca
KingAlpaca_Ice.desc:
With a heart of ice, this Pal is terrible at expressing its emotions.
A solitary individual is pitiable,
seen as too clumsy in the eyes of a <characterName id=|Alpaca|/>.

KingBahamut.name: Blazamut
KingBahamut.desc:
Legends say it was born during a volcanic eruption.
A strange group even claims that this continent is laid upon
the back of a giant <characterName id=|KingBahamut|/>.

Kirin.name: Univolt
Kirin.desc:
It used to be considered an emissary of the Thunder God, and thus was not hunted by people.
However, after witnesses observed one die from a lightning strike,
its reverence faded, and it quite literally fell into the role of a workhorse.

Kitsunebi.name: Foxparks
Kitsunebi.desc:
It is unskilled at controlling fire from the moment it is born
and tends to choke on the flames it breathes unintentionally.
<characterName id=|Kitsunebi|/> sneezes are one of the leading causes of forest fires.

LavaGirl.name: Flambelle
LavaGirl.desc:
When it starts crying, this Pal produces magma in place of tears.
The magma that pours out is absorbed back into its body, causing it to get hotter and hotter.
The more it cries, the stronger it becomes.

LazyCatfish.name: Dumud
LazyCatfish.desc:
When too relaxed, its reaction time drastically declines.
Even if it were sliced from head to tail,
it probably wouldn't even realize that it should be dead until the next morning.

LazyDragon.name: Relaxaurus
LazyDragon.desc:
Contrary to its blasé appearance, it's quite ferocious.
It perceives everything in its sight as prey
and will stop at nothing to devour it.

LazyDragon_Electric.name: Relaxaurus Lux
LazyDragon_Electric.desc:
One day, <characterName id=|LazyDragon|/> had an idea.
Maybe it was about time for a change.
Just then, an electric shock raced through its body!

LilyQueen.name: Lyleen
LilyQueen.desc:
A docile Pal full of love.
It watches over small Pals who have lost their parents.
It uses a full-power <activeSkillName id=|SolarBeam|/> to discipline naughty Pals.

LilyQueen_Dark.name: Lyleen Noct
LilyQueen_Dark.desc:
An elegant Pal full of grace.
It admonishes any who are disrespectful with a painful slap.
Some Pals actively seek out this punishment.

LittleBriarRose.name: Bristla
LittleBriarRose.desc:
This prickly Pal's thorns are highly poisonous.
It is friendly with <characterName id=|CuteButterfly|/> and only smiles
while a <characterName id=|CuteButterfly|/> is drinking its nectar.

LizardMan.name: Leezpunk
LizardMan.desc:
A Pal that always takes great care to maintain a stylish stance.
Always on the hunt for the coolest poses, if given a mirror
it will spend all day posing in front of it.

LizardMan_Fire.name: Leezpunk Ignis
LizardMan_Fire.desc:
A Pal that has an unusual obsession with their standing posture.
Always in search of the hottest pose,
this Pal's owner is constantly presented with fervent stances.

Manticore.name: Blazehowl
Manticore.desc:
While it prefers raw meat, it always ends up eating well-done meat.
This is due to its blistering claws,
which it uses as its weapon—it simply doesn't realize its prey gets burned to a crisp.

Manticore_Dark.name: Blazehowl Noct
Manticore_Dark.desc:
While it prefers raw meat, it always ends up eating tainted meat.
This is due to its dark claws,
which it uses as its weapon—it simply doesn't realize its prey gets cursed.

Monkey.name: Tanzee
Monkey.desc:
Long ago, this Pal used long objects like tree branches as weapons.
After coming into contact with humans, however,
it found something slightly more effective: guns.

MopBaby.name: Swee
MopBaby.desc:
Crawling along the ground, it eats microscopic organic matter.
After a while, it discharges any substances that provide no nutrition.
By using it as a mop for cleaning, everyone wins!

MopKing.name: Sweepa
MopKing.desc:
While hibernating, a large number of <characterName id=|MopBaby|/>
hide within its voluminous body hair.
The most ever recorded is 101.

Mutant.name: Lunaris
Mutant.desc:
It can control those who carelessly stare into its eyes.
Those seen with a <characterName id=|Mutant|/> are in its mind,
simply under its control.

NaughtyCat.name: Grintale
NaughtyCat.desc:
<characterName id=|NaughtyCat|/>'s eyes light up the moment
anyone enters its territory.
This is no figure of speech—its eyes literally light up.

NegativeKoala.name: Depresso
NegativeKoala.desc:
It has few friends because of the perpetually grouchy look on its face,
but it is in fact kindhearted.
Some have seen it feeding <characterName id=|CuteFox|/>who have strayed from their pack.

NegativeOctopus.name: Killamari
NegativeOctopus.desc:
It wraps itself around an enemy's head, sucking out their insides.
Pal mummies are occasionally found, but these are in fact
<characterName id=|NegativeOctopus|/> victims.

NightFox.name: Nox
NightFox.desc:
If you find <characterName id=|NightFox|/> hair in your bedding, you should
leave it where it lays and leave immediately.
Picking it up is a one-way-ticket to a never ending night.

Penguin.name: Pengullet
Penguin.desc:
The feathers of this Pal have all but disappeared,
but sadly, its desire to fly has remained as strong as ever.
Even now, it tries to fly again in any way it can.

PinkCat.name: Cattiva
PinkCat.desc:
At a glance it appears full of confidence, but it is in fact weak and cowardly.
Being toyed with by a <characterName id=|PinkCat|/>
is in many ways the greatest of disgraces.

PinkLizard.name: Lovander
PinkLizard.desc:
Seeking a night of love, it is always chasing someone around.
At first it only showed interest in other Pals, but in recent years
even humans have become the target of its debauchery.

PinkRabbit.name: Ribbuny
PinkRabbit.desc:
A Pal who's never without a bright smile.
Occasionally, it gets its tentacles tied up in knots by <characterName id=|PinkCat|/>'s pranks.
During those moments, its expression changes into something altogether demonic.

PlantSlime.name: Gumoss
PlantSlime.desc:
A strange Pal with a body resembling tree sap.
It gradually loses strength if it has nothing to cover
its body with, eventually rotting away.

QueenBee.name: Elizabee
QueenBee.desc:
A chosen queen to rule over <characterName id=|SoldierBee|/>s.
There is a never ending stream of servants willing to work themselves to death
for the pleasure of serving their queen.

RaijinDaughter.name: Dazzi
RaijinDaughter.desc:
Often kind to lonely pals.
However, the moment a Pal mistakes this for actual companionship,
it seizes the opportunity to blast them with a thunderbolt.

RedArmorBird.name: Ragnahawk
RedArmorBird.desc:
Some think it is a related species to <characterName id=|ThunderBird|/>, but there is in fact no connection.
It mainly eats rocks, and after many long years its
beak and head have hardened to accommodate this diet.

RobinHood.name: Robinquill
RobinHood.desc:
A pal that is very similar to humans who hunt and live in the forests.
It may prove to be a key for understanding what Pals are
and how they diverged from humans so long ago.

RobinHood_Ground.name: Robinquill Terra
RobinHood_Ground.desc:
A Pal that lives a hunting life in rocky areas and is very close to humans.
When <characterName id=|RobinHood_Ground|/> bones are found in ruins,
there are always human bones found nearby as well.

Ronin.name: Bushi
Ronin.desc:
Its body becomes a blade upon death, to be taken up by the next generation.
If someone other than a <characterName id=|Ronin|/> wields this blade, the soul within
torments them until they are driven mad.

SaintCentaur.name: Paladius
SaintCentaur.desc:
Once one with <characterName id=|BlackCentaur|/>.
Its gleaming form is free of all negative emotions.
However, a glimmer of hatred can still be seen deep within its eyes.

SakuraSaurus.name: Broncherry
SakuraSaurus.desc:
Its scent drastically changes before and after pairing.
It exudes a pleasing aroma after finding a partner,
which is called the |fragrance of first love.|

SakuraSaurus_Water.name: Broncherry Aqua
SakuraSaurus_Water.desc:
Its scent drastically changes before and after pairing.
It exudes a pleasing aroma before finding a partner,
which is called the |perfume of purity.|

Serpent.name: Surfent
Serpent.desc:
Its hydrodynamic form is well suited to life in water.
Poachers often catch them and use them in place of surfboards.

Serpent_Ground.name: Surfent Terra
Serpent_Ground.desc:
Its aerodynamic form is well suited to life on the sand.
Poachers often catch them and use them in place of surfboards.

SharkKid.name: Gobfin
SharkKid.desc:
Long ago, it was a large and powerful aquatic Pal.
As food became scarce it evolved to live on land.
Since walking requires much energy, it gradually became smaller
and is now a small and puny Pal.

SharkKid_Fire.name: Gobfin Ignis
SharkKid_Fire.desc:
Once upon a time, it was a giant and powerful aquatic Pal.
However, with the dwindling availability of food, it ventured onto land.
As a consequence of burning many calories to walk,
it astonishingly awakened its power to control fire!

SheepBall.name: Lamball
SheepBall.desc:
A walk up a hill tends to end with this Pal tumbling back down.
This causes it to become dizzy and unable to move, making it easy to capture and kill.
As a result, this Pal has tumbled down to the very bottom of the food chain itself.

SkyDragon.name: Quivern
SkyDragon.desc:
Sleeping while cuddling a <characterName id=|SkyDragon|/> is said to be a heavenly experience,
but there are some who have been crushed and sent to heaven by ones
that toss and turn in their sleep.

SoldierBee.name: Beegarde
SoldierBee.desc:
A servant that pledges loyalty to <characterName id=|QueenBee|/>.
Any that cause harm to the queen are immediately expelled from the hive.
It will gladly give its life to protect its queen.

Suzaku.name: Suzaku
Suzaku.desc:
It was once believed to usher in the dry season.
Whenever there was a drought the previous year, people would relentlessly seek to cull its numbers,
hoping to bring about a plentiful harvest in the next year.

Suzaku_Water.name: Suzaku Aqua
Suzaku_Water.desc:
It was once believed to usher in the rainy season.
If there was a flood the previous year, people would relentlessly seek to cull its numbers,
hoping to avert disaster in the coming year.

SweetsSheep.name: Woolipop
SweetsSheep.desc:
Its entire body is 18,000 times sweeter than sugar.
Carnivorous Pals lured by its scent will find themselves overwhelmed by sweetness
and even pass out should they take a bite of this Pal.

ThunderBird.name: Beakon
ThunderBird.desc:
Some think it is a related species to <characterName id=|RedArmorBird|/>, but there is in fact no connection.
Using its sharp beak, it descends on its prey in a quick motion
that resembles a bolt of lightning.

ThunderDog.name: Rayhound
ThunderDog.desc:
At full speed, it could be mistaken for a bolt of lightning.
If two <characterName id=|ThunderDog|/>s collide, the sound is like that
of a powerful thunderclap.

ThunderDragonMan.name: Orserk
ThunderDragonMan.desc:
It sends electricity into its foes' wounds, roasting them from the inside out.
Fights between <characterName id=|ThunderDragonMan|/>
end in the blink of an eye.

Umihebi.name: Jormuntide
Umihebi.desc:
Legend says that the <characterName id=|Umihebi|/> was once a wise man,
who after being wrongly convicted and cast into a whirlpool,
returned as this Pal to destroy those who wronged him.

Umihebi_Fire.name: Jormuntide Ignis
Umihebi_Fire.desc:
Legend says the <characterName id=|Umihebi_Fire|/> was once a warrior who,
after being wrongly convicted and cast into a volcano,
returned as this Pal to destroy those who wronged him.

VioletFairy.name: Vaelet
VioletFairy.desc:
The castle was filled with the king's favorite flowers.
A great battle ensued, and flames approached the castle.
Amidst the chaos, the spirit of a flower appeared.
 - From the fairy tale, |The King's Flower.|

VolcanicMonster.name: Reptyro
VolcanicMonster.desc:
Magma-like blood runs throughout its body.
If a large amount of water is thrown on it, this water rapidly heats,
causing an immense vapor explosion.

VolcanicMonster_Ice.name: Ice Reptyro
VolcanicMonster_Ice.desc:
Ice cold blood runs throughout its body.
If heated rapidly, its blood evaporates,
causing an immense vapor explosion.

WeaselDragon.name: Chillet
WeaselDragon.desc:
It can curl up its body and roll around at extremely high speeds.
Long ago, people would tie bags of milk to domesticated
<characterName id=|WeaselDragon|/> as they grazed to produce butter
using this spinning force.

Werewolf.name: Loupmoon
Werewolf.desc:
The horns on its head grow under the moonlight.
It doesn't hate the sun, but its horns
itch when sunlight hits them.

WhiteMoth.name: Sibelyx
WhiteMoth.desc:
A Pal that likes the rain, and will often bask in rain showers
until the weather clears up.
On rainy days, <characterName id=|Kitsunebi|/> can often be found taking shelter beneath it.

WhiteTiger.name: Cryolinx
WhiteTiger.desc:
It can easily climb steep mountains with its hard claws.
However, its short legs make it difficult to descend,
often leaving it stranded in high places.

WizardOwl.name: Hoocrates
WizardOwl.desc:
Often lost in thought, it sometimes
finds it difficult to sleep.
|I think, therefore I am.|

WoolFox.name: Cremis
WoolFox.desc:
Compared to <characterName id=|SheepBall|/>, it has finer wool
and a temperament more suited for domestication.
However, it has historically always been kept as a pet.
Cuteness is considered a virtue.

Yeti.name: Wumpo
Yeti.desc:
Researchers once tried to shave off its hair to reveal its true form.
In the end, only hair was left, as if that was all there was to begin with.

Yeti_Grass.name: Wumpo Botan
Yeti_Grass.desc:
Researchers once tried to cut the grass off its body to reveal its true form.
In the end, only grass was left, as if that was all there was to begin with.
